events.message: I received my order yesterday but realized I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn’t suit my needs.
The customer's request for a return and refund was noted and categorized under Refund for processing.
An agent was assigned to handle the refund request and communicate the next steps to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The product is just not what I expected, so I’d like to return it and get my money back.
We have initiated your return authorization. Please ship the item back within 14 days, and once received, we will process your full refund immediately.
Thank you for your quick response and clear instructions. I will send the package back today.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3–5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for handling this so smoothly, I appreciate the good service.
We are glad to hear your refund was received. Closing your case now, and feel free to contact us anytime in the future.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund service, your feedback helps us improve.
